players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Diana was the one who was killed during the night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and try to uncover any suspicious behavior."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other. It's important that we work together to identify any suspicious behavior."
Bob: "Let's all just calm down and not jump to conclusions. We don't know who the killer is yet, so let's keep a level head."
You: "I think we should all share any information we might have that could help us identify the killer. Let's remember that communication and cooperation are key to solving this mystery."
Charlie: "I think we should all share any information we have that could help us identify the killer. Let's remember that communication and cooperation are key to solving this mystery."
